sentences.en: ...a machine which, in some respects, was the forerunner of the modern helicopter.
sentences.cn: …一台在某些方面是现代直升飞机的前身的机器。

sentences.en: A forerunner of those vehicles, though, is already being developed and tested.
sentences.cn: 不过这类飞机的先驱机型目前已在开发及测试中.

sentences.en: Already the forerunner was born, his mission attested by miracle and prophecy.
sentences.cn: 约翰诞生的消息和他使命的奇妙意义早已传遍各地.

sentences.en: Anglo - Saxon is the forerunner of modern English.
sentences.cn: 盎 格鲁撒 克逊语是现代英语的先驱.

sentences.en: Cynovo, an innovative team, is becoming a forerunner of MID industry!
sentences.cn: 一支勇于创新的MID国际化领军团队正在成为业界的领跑者!

sentences.en: Forerunner for the industry, the country has high visibility.
sentences.cn: 为行业先行者, 在全国有较高的知名度.

sentences.en: Frame designs the forerunner that is add sign work and soul.
sentences.cn: 框架设计是续志工作的先导和灵魂.

sentences.en: He was the forerunner of the resistance.
sentences.cn: 他是这个反抗运动的先驱者.

sentences.en: High quality product, come from mature technique and forerunner to process.
sentences.cn: 高品质的产品, 来源于成熟的技术和先进的加工.

sentences.en: Human cognitive development therefore is the forerunner of human rights advancement.
sentences.cn: 人类的认识发展是人权进步的先导.

sentences.en: In Great Britain Elias Ahmole ( 1617 - 1692 ) was the forerunner.
sentences.cn: 在英国,伊莱亚斯·阿摩尔 ( 1617-1692 ) 是先驱者.

sentences.en: It is the forerunner sex that attention to a program.
sentences.cn: 一是注重规划的先导性.

sentences.en: Penicillin was the forerunner of modern antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 青霉素是现代抗生素的先导.

sentences.en: Roadway heading is the forerunner for clearly knowing coal bed geological conditions.
sentences.cn: 掘进巷道是全面、准确了解矿井煤层地质条件的先导.

sentences.en: She is a forerunner of the modern women's movement.
sentences.cn: 她是现代妇女运动的先驱.

sentences.en: The EU is the forerunner and practitioner of global governance.
sentences.cn: 欧盟是全球治理的先行者和实践者.

trans.tran_en: If you describe a person or thing as the forerunner of someone or something similar, you mean they existed before them and either influenced their development or were a sign of what was going to happen
